item.dc:creator: @alooloo alooloo
item.description:
@alooloo wrote:

Hey, Ive got my client and everything Im just having trouble making it into a .Jar file, I made it and everything and when i click on it doesn’t open so I open the .bat file and it says, "Error: Could not find or load main class Loader"
That’s all it says then it says press any key to continue
If someone could help me or add me on skype: LegitBuddy and help me that would be great but just tell me why you’re adding me thanks
